textStr.p: Супер лукс имоти. Имот ДЕЛФИНА на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

LOCATION. Delfina is located in the middle of Peter Bay, just past its neighbor, Sea Cove, and just below Coco De Mer. Peter Bay is one of the few parcels of pristine north shore land that was not deeded over to the National Park by Lawrence Rockefeller in the 1950s, and today it remains tranquil, peaceful, private and exceptionally scenic, surrounded as it is on all sides by National Park forests, waters and reefs.
The Peter Bay homes (as of 2007 there were about15) have deeded access to Peter Bay Beach. The beach is located below Delfina, sandwiched between the National Park beaches at Trunk Bay and Cinnamon Bay. From Delfina it's less than a 5-minute walk to the turquoise waters and white sands of Peter Bay Beach. The white sands and usually calm waters of the beach provide good swimming and snorkeling on most days. On a perfect beach day in January the National park beaches will host hundreds of people, but it's rare to see even a handful of people on Peter Bay (it's privately owned).
The lovely, pristine views from Delfina look north and east and include the lush mountains of the north shore of St. John, Cinnamon, Maho and Francis Bays, Whistling Cay, and Great Thatch and Tortola islands in the British Virgin Islands. It's a picturesque 5-10 minute drive to the three restaurants at the 5-star Caneel Bay Resort, and an additional 5 minutes to the captivating restaurants, shops and groceries in the delightful town of Cruz Bay.

tr.td:
Yes - 30' semicircle with
wet bar, icemaker & minifridge

div.p:
DESIGN. Delfina is a stately but fun loving home with more than 11,000 sq/ft of interior living space, decks and balconies. It consists of a 3-level great house and an attached 2-level building that contains the four guest bedrooms (see photo 2 ). As you drive into Delfina's large brick courtyard your first view reveals only a small portion of this spacious villa. You park in the courtyard on the upper level, open the mahogany gate and then descend a few stairs to the main level of the great house.
In the great house the master bedroom/bath and deck occupy the top level. The pool, patios and sundecks, living room, lanai, interior and exterior dining areas and the kitchen occupy the spacious second level. The lower level of the great house is the entertainment headquarters for both kids and adults, with the stone bar, theater, pool table and game room, 6th bed and bath and a large covered deck. The four guest bedrooms are partly visible to the left of the main house in photo 2 and although the 2 lower bedrooms are hidden by a bush in photo 2, they do offer very nice ocean views. All levels of the great house and the guest bedrooms are accessed by internal stairs. In addition to the 5 granite and mahogany baths attached to the bedroom suites, there is a half bath by the pool and another half bath off the dining room.

textStr.p:
CARIBBEAN VILLAS'S VIEW. Peter Bay is a very beautiful and unique cove that is surrounded by the turquoise waters and lush subtropical forest of the National Park, on St John's exclusive north shore. As of 2006, there were about 15 villas built in this small residential enclave. Although few in number, these distinctive homes have given Peter Bay a reputation as one of the Caribbean's finest collections of distinctive island homes.
Within Peter Bay we offer some exceptional vacation homes including Mermaid Falls, Coco De Mer, Sea Cove, the Peter Bay Beach House, and now Delfina. Together these villas have redefined the term "luxury home" on St John, and they have made Peter Bay one of the Caribbean's most unique neighborhoods of luxury villas.
All the Peter Bay homes are privately owned and each is a unique design with interior furnishings and dЁ¦cor that reflect the individual owner's taste. In the matter of excellent dЁ¦cor, furnishings and taste, Delfina really excels. In addition to being quite elegant, Delfina is also pure fun and entertainment.
This exclusive Peter Bay location, and the striking design, plus everything you'd want in entertainment earns Delfina the label as one of St. John's "Ultra Luxury Villas", and the floor plan and design make this a very versatile home for families, business meetings, or groups of friends or couples.

ul.li: An exclusive Peter Bay location that offers lovely views, tranquility and privacy and a 3-minute walk to the beach at Peter Bay;
Superb outdoor living amenities with an elegant lanai, BBQ/dining area, and a pool and hot tub with a wet bar, icemaker, mini refridge, and half bath;
Central air conditioning throughout the entire house;
Romantic bedroom suites, each with a different dЁ¦cor, private deck and lovely views;
DSL in every bedroom and DSL or Wifi throughout the villa;
A home theater with 50"; flat screen TV/DVD, 9 DVD players and 6 CD players plus lots of movies and music;
Pool, pinball, electronic darts and an Xbox on the lower level

textStr.p: Please note: The guest services and maintenance for this villa have been contracted out to a St. John couple, Michelle and Chuck, who do business under the name of St John Savvy. Chuck and Michelle, operate a company that oversees luxury villas and their guests (She's the sweet one, a.k.a. the president, and he's known as Chuckles). They maintain a select portfolio of some of St. John's finest villas, including Mermaid Falls, Coco De Mer, and Sea Cove. They're a responsive, friendly and capable team, and have an extensive knowledge of St. John, its people and its customs. You're in good hands with Chuck and Michelle.
За контакти: http://www.caribbeanvilla.com/ultimate/delfina/index.asp

textStr.P: Супер лукс имоти. Имот OCEAN VILLA на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

Location. John’s Folly Ocean Villa is named after the area where it is located - John’s Folly -which is a neighborhood in Coral Bay. It takes a bit longer to get here (it’s about 10 miles from the ferry dock in Cruz Bay) but for the extra effort you are rewarded with one of the most private, quiet, peaceful and natural waterfront villa locations on St. John. This is a location where your senses are constantly caressed by the sights, sounds, colors and fragrances of the ocean. The stunning east facing ocean views look out at Norman Island (home of the Bight) and Peter Island (not to be confused with Peter Bay) in the British Virgin Islands. The south facing water views look towards the Caribbean Sea and Rams Head (the 300 foot cliff that is St. John’s southernmost point.). Looking to the north and east, there’s neither house nor human to be seen anywhere, but the sound of breaking surf follows you everywhere.

John’s Folly is exceptionally private (clothing optional), but it’s not remote, for there are 6 restaurants, 2 small grocery stores, a gas station and many small shops within a 3 mile drive. It’s also a short drive (5- 10 minutes) to the two picturesque National Park beaches at Salt Pond Bay and Lameshur Bay and to the trail head for the hike out to Rams Head. For trips into Cruz Bay, it’s a 35 - 45 minute drive depending on whether you take the scenic Centerline Drive or the ultra scenic North Shore Road.
Year completed 2008
Villa size 6000+ sq. ft.
Bedrms/Baths 6 bdrms, 6 baths, 2 half baths
Beds 5 kings plus king/twins
Main House Pool Yes - 37 x 13 x 5 feet
Guest House Pool Yes - 14 x 10 x 5 feet
A/C Yes - all rooms
High speed internet (Wifi) Yes
IPod connectivity Yes
Closest beach Salt Pond - 5 min drive
Maid Service Not Included
Damage Deposit $1,000

Design. John’s Folly is really two villas; a Main House and a Guest House. The Main House has a 1-level great room (living, dining and kitchen areas) and two, 2-level bedroom towers, while the Guest House also has a 1-level great room plus one more 2-level bedroom tower. Altogether, that’s five separate buildings that are intelligently designed to blend together into a unique and fascinating luxury estate.

As you drive through the gated entrance to John’s Folly, the first buildings that you see are the bedroom tower and the great room of the Guest House. Even though it’s behind the Main House, the Guest House’s sight lines were carefully drawn to insure that every room has charming water views. You park inside the gated entrance and walk around the Guest House to the Main House. In the area between the Main House and the bedroom towers there is a cozy, sheltered plaza that leads into the great room of the Main House. Stairs off the plaza also lead down to the coral beach for beachcombing. On the left side (looking at the water) of the Main House is a large exterior dining gazebo, and to the left of the gazebo is a sundeck and a trellised cocktail deck that feels like it is built above the ocean. The large infinity edged pool is located in front of the gazebo and wide gentle stairs lead from the gazebo into the pool.

The Main House. The 740 sq/ft main house includes this estates primary living, dining and kitchen facilities. This traditionally designed building has tiled floors, central a/c, a cathedral ceiling, windows all around, and gorgeous ocean views. The heart of the living room is a home theater system with a 46 inch flat screen TV, DVD and stereo, all of which play through five ceiling mounted Kliesch speakers. On the left side of the living room, a 12 foot mahogany and glass doors open to a 400 sq/ft dining gazebo (covered deck) with a cast iron table that seats 10-12 persons. The gazebo also has a stainless gas grill and rotisserie, a mini refrigerator, a bar sink, an icemaker and outside speakers.

There is also dining for 8 in the interior dining alcove off the kitchen. The dining nook is so close to the water that it creates the sensation of dining over the water. The kitchen is on the right side of the great room, and it is similar in size and equipment to the guest house kitchen with granite countertops and cherry cabinets, a stainless steel refrigerator/freezer, a cook top stove and double oven, dishwasher, water purifier and icemaker, microwave, toaster, 2 coffeemakers and a blender. A half bath is off the kitchen.

The Main House – Bedrooms. The Main House’s two bedroom towers are located on both sides of the house. Each of the four bedrooms is 255 sq/ft, plus a private balcony/deck with lovely water views. Each bedroom has a/c, a king bed (3 kings, 2 twins convert to a king), a flat screen TV/DVD, a desk and chair, cushioned armchairs, a closet, screened opening windows and a granite and cherry bath with a stone exterior shower.

Caribbean Villas’ Comments. In February of 2008 we added two villas that we consider unique – at least within the St. John universe. The contemporary luxury home called Kalorama certainly qualifies as unique, and although John’s Folly is a more traditional design, it too is a one of a kind villa.

There are two features that make John’s Folly’s a distinctive villa - the design concept, and its location. Unlike most “main house–guest house” arrangements, the John’s Folly guest house is a well furnished luxury villa in its own right - with its own pool and sundeck, plus living dining, and kitchen facilities. Quality wise, the Guest House is comparable with the Main House, it’s just smaller.

The paramount feature that makes John’s Folly a unique estate is its location. We regard this as one of the most peaceful and quiet, unspoiled waterfront villa locations on St. John. The back walls of the buildings act as a privacy screen, so once you’re inside the compound you have a wonderful sense of undisturbed and unspoiled privacy. You have no neighbors within 200 degrees of view, so after a few hours at John’s Folly it’s quite easy to get that delightful feeling of being alone on a private island. At night, except for a few lights from sailboats anchored off Norman Island, most of the lights you see are stars in the heavens. During the day, you’re always looking at and listening to the colors and sounds of the ocean. This is an environment that refreshes the spirit and revives the soul in only the way that warm waters, sun and trade winds can do. This is a back to nature luxury vacation.
Features worth noting include:

UL.LI:
We gave the sound system the full Aerosmith sound test. With 5-speaker surround sound in the main house, plus 5 speakers on the dining gazebo and sundeck, you’re covered in quality sound. Like your Pavarotti loud, or louder? Turn it up; there are no neighbors to be disturbed.
Bedrooms in towers enjoy some distinct advantages. First, you have light, fresh air and great views, coming at you from three (sometimes 4) directions. Second, there are no common walls, so the privacy is excellent.
If you’ve had enough sun and environmental rejuvenation, then step inside, - every room is air-conditioned.
This is a great design for multiple families, small business groups or couples. Everyone has their own space and lots of privacy.
You’re a 5 minute drive from 2 National Park beaches at Salt Pond and Lameshur Bays

textStr.P: Overall, this is a fascinating new vacation estate in a beautiful naturalist setting.
Повече инфо: http://www.caribbeanvilla.com/johns-folly/index.html
Супер лукс имоти. Имот SOUTH PALM на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

Location. South Palm is located in the exclusive Virgin Grand Estates, which is a neighborhood of recently built, high-quality, multi million dollar vacation homes. South Palm sits at an elevation of about 290 feet with very pretty views of Great Cruz Bay, the Caribbean Sea, St. Thomas and other islands off in the distance. You’ll also enjoy colorful sunset views and the twinkling lights of St. Thomas at night. As of November of 2006, South Palm is the only house on its drive and it has no abutting neighbors. This is a very peaceful and private location with very little traffic and discreet clothing optional sunbathing. This is also a villa for sun lover's, with sun on the pool deck from early morning to sunset. It’s a 5 minute walk to the beach, restaurants, fitness room, spa and shops at the Westin Beach Resort, below you, but if you linger at the beach bar, it’s a bit longer walking up the hill. Of all the Virgin Grand Estates homes, South Palm has the easiest walk to the Westin. The many restaurants, bars, shops and other delights of the village of Cruz Bay are a 10-15 minute drive, entirely on paved roads.
textStr.DIV:
Design. South Palm’s owner is a professional homebuilder who spent many years planning this home, which was completed in the summer of 2006. The attractive and functional 3-level design seen here is somewhat similar to the design of its popular Virgin Grand neighbor, Vista Caribe. South Palm has multiple exterior rooflines, but the 2800 sq/ft interior is all under one roof. The design incorporates many classic architectural features such as tiled roofs, beamed cathedral ceilings, coral stone floors, Doric columns, French doors under arched windows and a 750 sq/ft covered veranda (deck) on the villa’s south and east sides, and an 1100 sq/ft antique brick pool deck.
You park above the house and descend stairs to the main level and enter into the great room. The kitchen, powder room and dining areas adjoin the great room, and multiple French doors open to the tiled and covered decks. Off the deck, exterior stairs lead down a half level to the pool and an 1100 sq/ft brick sun deck. There is one bedroom/bath and private balcony on the main level, and a second bedroom/bath and private balcony is on the 3rd (upper) level. The other two master bedrooms are on the lower level and open to a sun terrace that is below the pool level. All four bedrooms are accessed by interior stairs and the entire site is colorfully landscaped with a vibrant array of tropical vegetation.

DIV.P: Kitchen. This is a handsome gourmet kitchen with beautiful custom made Brazilian cherry cabinets, granite countertops and coral stone floors. The kitchen is centered on a 6-burner gas stove with a hood and oven. Other appliances include a s/s refrigerator/freezer, s/s dishwasher, garbage compactor, microwave, toaster, blender, coffee maker, and abundant cookware and dinnerware. There is a half bath (powder room) and a handsome laundry room off the kitchen. A built in gas grill is outside the kitchen on the deck, protected from the occasional shower.

Bedrooms. Each air conditioned bedroom is identical in size and all face southwest to capture the views through screened French doors. All the bedrooms have king beds, a satellite TV in an armoire and adequate closet space. Each has a tiled bath with granite counters, Brazilian cherry cabinets, copper sinks and bronze fixtures, and an oversized shower. Three of the bedrooms also have coral stone outdoor showers. The upper level and main level bedrooms have private balconies while the two lower level bedrooms share a private 450 sq ft brick sun terrace with access to the pool. All towels and linens for 8 people are included.

Caribbean Villa's View. The owner of South Palm is an experienced custom homebuilder who oversaw the design and construction of his island home. This seems to be a theme at the Virgin Grand Estates, where beautiful homes like Rapture, C’est Blue, and Vista Caribe were all built by different owners who are luxury home builders. Like the three Virgin Grand owner/builders before him, South Palm’s owner did a superb job. The site, layout, construction materials, and livability are all first class. Some of the many features that we like include:

UL.LI:
Large outdoor covered decks that overlook the pool and have lovely views, privacy and comfortable deck furniture. If you love to be outside but not in the sun, covered decks are a blessing.
Beautiful, colorful landscaping that constantly reminds you that you’re in the tropics
A 32” satellite TV in the great room and 20” flat screen satellite TVs in every bedroom, plus high speed satellite internet access.
A stereo/CD system with an iPod hookup with speakers in the great room plus outdoor speakers on the deck.
A southwest sunny orientation with central a/c throughout the villa, which makes this home especially enjoyable in the summer months.
A 15’ x 22’ very private pool enclosed on 3 sides by a handsome brick sundeck.
An overall commitment to quality, as demonstrated by the use of copper sinks, Brazilian cherry and granite in every bathroom, the kitchen and even the laundry and powder rooms.
A very clever site and building plan that makes South Palm one of the quietest, most peaceful and private sites within the exclusive Virgin Grand Estates.

DIV.P: South Palm was designed with families in mind, with all the bedrooms under one roof, interior stairs and two bedrooms at ground level. This is also an excellent home for 2-4 couples, or honeymooners or lovers looking for some extra privacy. The owner welcomes weddings and this would be a great function house because the condos and hotel rooms of the Westin are (a walk) below you. Overall, South Palm is a villa that shows meticulous planning and excellent taste in the design and construction of the house and its surroundings. It was designed to be a splendid vacation home, and it succeeds.

textStr.P: Повече инфо: http://www.caribbeanvilla.com/south_palm/index.html
Лукс имоти. Имот LA BELLA VILLA на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

LOCATION. La Bella Villa sits on a hill overlooking the scenic and tranquil harbor of Coral Bay (Coral Bay-northern hillside). A small and quaint community, Coral Bay is the "other" village on St. John, located about 20-25 minutes from Cruz Bay. The picturesque views from Bella Villa sweep to the south and west and include Coral Bay Harbor and the Bordeaux Mountain area. Bella Villa is well screened from other villas by tropical vegetation, resulting in a peaceful setting with a good amount of privacy. It's a 5-minute drive to five worth-a-visit restaurants in Coral Bay, and a 10-minute drive to the white sand, National Park beaches at Maho and Francis Bays (north shore) and Salt Pond on the south shore.

DESIGN. This is a very attractive, one level villa built of native stone and concrete. The beautiful stone walls of the house are accented by 10 sets of hand rubbed and screened double mahogany doors that open to delightful views and cooling breezes. As you enter the great room of the villa, the master bedroom is on the left and the guest bedroom is on the right of the living area. Inside, tiled floors, beamed cathedral ceilings, abundant mahogany, ceiling fans and fine furnishings create a rich and traditional tropical dЁ¦cor. Outside, a large covered deck runs along the entire south side of the house and provides a spacious area for dining and relaxing, while the pool and private sundeck on the sunny southwest side of the house are great for grilling, cooling off and getting a full body tan.

Living / Dining / Kitchen. The living room is tastefully furnished with wicker and mahogany furniture and Caribbean art work. A British armoire contains a cable TV, VCR and DVD, plus a stereo system with a CD player. Three sets of screened mahogany doors open to the covered deck and views of sea, sky and mountains. The primary dining table seats 6-8 on the covered deck, while on the pool deck there is a gas grill and a table for 4. The NEFF custom kitchen is fully equipped with a granite sink, 4-burner gas stove and oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, blender, and complete cookware and dinnerware. Bella Villa includes a washer/dryer, telephone, beach chairs and all linens and towels.

Bedrooms. The master bedroom is both alluring and romantic with a king 4-poster bed and abundant closet space. The master bedroom has six sets of screened mahogany doors that open to great views and gentle breezes, plus a tiled bath and shower. The second bedroom (queen bed) overlooks the pool deck and has a tiled bath with a garden shower that is bordered by stone walls. There is also a pull out sofa bed in the living room.

Caribbean Villa's View. La Bella Villa was built in 2001, it is in like-new condition because it was lightly used from 2001 - 2004 and was not offered for vacation rentals until October of 2004. Overall, this is an easy home to recommend; it's attractive, well built and nicely furnished and appointed. The traditional island design and quality interior dЁ¦cor combine to create a refined and romantic ambiance, and the hillside location provides charming views of the Caribbean plus clothing optional privacy. La Bella Villa is also priced competitively, and makes a great home for a honeymoon, or for 1-2 couples or for a small family with older children (this villa is not recommended for children under 5). La Bella Villa is a no smoking house, please.
За информация и контакти: http://www.caribbeanvilla.com/bella-villa/default.html
Лукс имоти. Имот CINNAMON BAY ESTATE на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

CINNAMON BAY ESTATE. The National Park setting of this 3 bedroom, 3 1/2 bath villa offers some of the most beautiful views and undisturbed tranquillity and privacy available on St. John, yet you're only 10 - 15 minutes from Cruz Bay. Like the setting, the villa itself is superb. With it's 35 foot beamed cathedral ceilings, terra cotta tiled floors, spacious living area, wrap around decks, large pool and sundeck and romantic garden hottub, this is the very essence of a refined and exclusive, yet very comfortable island home.

LOCATION. This home is one of a few alluring rental villas located along the north shore within the unspoiled and uniquely beautiful V. I. National Park. It is the neighbor of Cinnamon Ridge, and both of these outstanding homes are located about 170’ above Cinnamon Beach, one of the world’s most beautiful beaches. The 200 degree view is one of the most gorgeous in all of the Caribbean and has been featured on the covers of Islands and Caribbean Travel and Life magazines. The view includes Tortola, Jost Van Dyke, a dozen other islands and dazzling white sand beaches and turquoise waters. Cinnamon Bay, Trunk Bay and Peter Bay lie below you and offer excellent swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, wind surfing, sunning and relaxing

BEDROOMS. As you enter this very refined villa to your left and right are handsome mahogany stairs that lead up to very private master and guest bedrooms, both of which are on the upper level and enjoy marvelous views . The master bedroom (king) has a large walk-in closet, a cathedral ceiling, ceiling fans, a tiled bath and shower, a relaxing whirlpool bath and a private deck. Both guest bedrooms (1 king, 2 twins-convert to king) have a tiled bath and shower and both bedrooms open to private breakfast decks.

LIVING/DINING/KITCHEN. As you enter through 9 foot mahogany doors, a 23 foot wall of glass reveals one of the most beautiful views in the Caribbean. The 35 foot beamed cathedral ceiling with skylights gives the living area a grand feeling, while the rattan and wicker furniture and the accessories impart a tropical essence. A cable color TV / VCR and a stereo/cassette/CD player provides some entertainment, but the real entertainment lies just outside your walls in the beauty that surrounds you.
Meals may be served at any of 3 dining areas. The table on the covered dining deck off the kitchen seats 6 - 8, the interior dining table seats 4 - 6 and the tables on the pool deck also seat 4 - 6.
The beautiful marble and mahogany kitchen should keep any chef happy, with a 4 burner stove and oven, refrig/freezer, microwave, dishwasher, toaster oven, blender, coffee maker, and telephone. A half bath and washer/dryer are located off the kitchen and a gas barbecue is located on the covered deck.

CARIBBEAN VILLAS' VIEW. We were delighted to add this elegant, tropically splendid villa to our portfolio in 1999, for this is one of the most outstanding 3 bedroom villas in the Virgin Islands. This National Park setting is the very essence of pristine island splendor, with magnificent day and evening views, undisturbed privacy and total peace and quiet, yet you're only a 1/2 mile from the dazzling white sands and calm turquoise waters of Cinnamon Bay. Like the setting, the house is a knockout with an abundance of style and class. With the completion of an extensive remodeling in November, 1999, including an exquisite new 26’ pool with a heatpump, a sundeck, and a 6 person hot tub, this villa graduated from great to magnificent. Cinnamon Bay Estate is ideal for 1 - 3 couples or families and it's romantic setting makes this a perfect home for honeymooners and lovers. For larger families or groups, or for a wedding in a dreamlike, never to be forgotten setting, Cinnamon Bay Estate can be rented along with it's beautiful neighbor, Cinnamon Ridge, for a total of 8 bedrooms (16 people) in paradise.
Повече инфо: http://www.caribbeanvilla.com/cinnamonbay/cinnamonbay.html
Лукс имоти. Имот Amarosa на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

LOCATION. As its name implies, Amarosa-Peter Bay is located in St John’s premium neighborhood – Peter Bay. Like its neighbor Mermaid Falls, Amorosa is in upper Peter Bay and towers over the grand homes located in lower Peter Bay. Surrounded by the National Park, Amorosa enjoys a picturesque location with spectacular views of the turquoise waters of Cinnamon Bay, the emerald green forests of the Park, and islands floating on the distant horizon.
Your primary view looks directly at the British island of Jost Van Dyke across 5 miles of colorful ocean. The view stretches from lush mountains in the west, past Maho, Cinnamon, and Francis Bays, past Whistling Cay, and Great Thatch Island in the north and on to the emerald hills and a bit of Tortola in the northeast. The lovely views and the National Park setting make this one of the most highly prized locations in the Caribbean Islands.
Guests of Amorosa may use the private beach at Peter Bay, which is located between the National Park beaches at Trunk and Cinnamon Bays. From Amorosa it’s a 5- 10 minute walk to the beach, and the calm 82 degree waters provide excellent swimming and good snorkeling. On a perfect beach day the National park beaches will host hundreds of people, but it’s rare to see more than a few people on Peter Bay, for it’s reserved exclusively for Peter Bay owners and guests. If you prefer, it's a 3-minute drive to the National park beaches at Trunk or Cinnamon Bays.
The very picturesque drive to the excellent restaurants and beaches at the 5 star Caneel Bay Resort takes 5 minutes. From Caneel it’s another 5 minutes to the excellent restaurants, shops and groceries in the charming town of Cruz Bay.

TR.TD: Peter Bay Beach, a 5-7 min walk

textStr.DIV:
DESIGN. Amorosa was carefully designed to capture the look and feel of the classic villas of Italy. It recreates the old world beauty of an elegant 18th century Tuscan villa, but it also incorporates the amenities, appliances and comforts of a modern luxury home. It’s a lovely blend of two different worlds.
Amorosa consists of two buildings – the main house and the bedroom tower – each with two levels. After passing through the gated entrance, you enter Amorosa on the lower level of the main house which contains the living, dining and kitchen areas, as well as a wine tasting room and a 5th bathroom/powder room. The pool and the sun deck are off the living room, while the lovely wine room, the stone bar and the murmuring stone brook are off the kitchen. Interior mahogany stairs lead up the upper level with a master bedroom/bath and a guest bedroom/bath. There is also a private garden patio and a 6 person hot tub on the upper level.
The bedroom tower contains a bedroom/bath on each level, with the upper bedroom accessed by exterior stairs. All the bedrooms have central a/c, private balconies and wonderful views.
textStr.P:
LIVING ROOM AND DINING ROOM. In the living and dining rooms the antique furnishings, marble floors, 12 foot tall wood beamed ceilings, peach Bellagio wall finish, and the 9 foot tall mahogany doors all create a rich, handsome setting that replicates the ageless beauty of ancient Italy. There’s nothing old however about the 46 inch flat screen TV with DVD and surround sound, and the stereo with CD player plus IPod dock.
Four sets of fully screened doors opens to the coral stone decks and an exterior dining table that seats 8 persons. The interior dining room is quite beautiful with an antique wood table that also seats 8. At one end of the dining room a sink (for wine tasting) is cut into a 4 inch marble slab supported by a stone vanity that is flanked by stone arches and lit by hand made copper lights

KITCHEN. This is a kitchen of exceptional beauty and functionality, even when measured against Peter Bay’s lofty standards. The mahogany cabinets were custom built by St. John’s finest craftsmen and custom hand crafted copper lights provide the lighting. The countertops, floors and even the sink are deep veined Italian marble, and the combination of high grade marble and Honduran mahogany is exquisite. The appliances are top shelf, including a Wolf 6-burner gas range and oven, a Thermadore dishwasher, and a Viking Commercial refrigerator and freezer with ice dispenser and water spigot. A microwave oven, blender, and coffeemaker are also included. An arched opening to the living room allows the chef(s) to enjoy a delightful view of Cinnamon Bay from the kitchen.

WINE ROOM AND STONE BAR. The climate controlled wine room was completed in 2007, but it looks for all the world like it was built 400 years ago. This room also has a sink resting on a marble slab and stone vanity. The floor is detailed antique brick and the ceiling is dropped slate. This is a beautiful example of timeless architecture, and if you’re a wine or architectural connoisseur, you’ll savor this vintage blend.
The handsome stone and marble bar is just outside the wine tasting room. The bar includes a sink and refrigerator, plus a flat screen TV and music. The back side of the bar is a stone wall with a small waterfall that flows down from the upper level. Beside the bar, a Cal Flame stainless, 4-burner gas grill is built into a marble, stone and antique brick counter. The trickling water sounds, lovely views and antique elegance - plus the grilled mahi-mahi burger and the drink in your hand – all create a very nice effect.
BEDROOMS. There are two bedrooms on the upper level of the main house, and two more bedrooms in the 2-story tower. All the bedrooms have a king bed and all are similar in size and decor. Each bedroom has a private tiled balcony with romantic water views, and a lovely stone and marble bath and shower. The master bath in the main house has inside and outside showers. Every bedroom is air conditioned, but if you prefer the natural a/c of the gentle trade winds, the Barano doors and windows are fully screened. Each bedroom has an I Home stereo, which combines an IPod docking station with an AM/FM stereo clock radio.

UL.LI:
the beautiful look and feel of a centuries old, classic Italian villa that has been modernized with a pool and hot tub, plus central a/c, Wifi connectivity and Ipod music throughout the house,
A showcase gourmet kitchen with gorgeous custom mahogany cabinetry, marble floors and countertops and top name appliances such as Viking, Thermadore, and Wolf,
access to the peaceful, quiet and private white sands and turquoise waters of Peter Bay Beach directly below you,
silent and very effective central air conditioning in all rooms,
an Ipod friendly environment with I Home stereos (a small stereo with an IPod dock) in each bedroom, plus the capability to play IPod (or CD) music in the living, dining and kitchen areas, and on the deck or at the pool or bar,
a private 6 person hot tub, plus a pool, both with delightful views of Jost Van Dyke and Cinnamon Bay,
high speed access that is configured for Wifi reception throughout the house,

textStr.P: Other great features include;

UL.LI:
An elegant and unique stone and marble bar with a sink and small refrig, exterior speakers, a flat screen TV and a Cal Flame grill. The north wall of the bar is a 15 foot vertical stone brook that - oh so soothingly - flows into a small pond. It’s very Zen.
A murmuring brook, soft music, a beautiful bar – now, how about you on a massage table getting your favorite treatment. Almost all St. John masseuses make house calls, and Amorosa comes equipped with a professional massage table. It’s right there off the bar and we recommend that you give it plenty of use.
A very lovely and traditional, climate controlled 150 bottle wine room (Tuscany is known for its wines), complete with a sink (for wine tasting) and an antique table for glasses and bottles. Salute!
At 7500 sq/ft Amoroso is more mid sized than many of the other Peter Bay homes that we offer. This gives Amoroso a warm and romantic ambiance that makes it (along with Mermaid Falls) a perfect sized luxury home for 1 - 2 couples.

textStr.P: Amorosa will comfortably accommodate 8 persons and the design is well suited for families with children. If you lock off the guest tower and use just the 2-bedroom main house, Amorosa becomes one of our top recommendations for a very romantic, intimate luxury home for honeymooners or lovers.
Повече инфо: http://www.caribbeanvilla.com/amorosa/index.html
Лукс имоти. Имот Francis Bay Estates на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

Location. On an island known for its fabulous villa locations, Francis Bay Estate’s location is quite unique and exceptional. This villa sits a short distance from the beautiful beach at Francis Bay. It is surrounded by National Park lands and has no abutting neighbors. Except for one other home visible in the distance, your view remains natural and unspoiled. Even by St. John’s high standards, the tranquility, peacefulness and privacy of this setting are quite exceptional.
It’s an easy 5 – 10 minute walk down a gentle slope to the beautiful white sands at Francis Bay Beach. From the beach you can snorkel or swim (the preferred route) over to the calm turquoise waters and white sands of Maho Bay, or it’s a short drive.
The views from your villa stretch from Mary’s Point on St. John west to the islands of St. Thomas, and the Hans Lollicks, and then to Lovango, Congo and Thatch Cays. Fifteen miles to the west, 1500 foot Crown Mountain on St Thomas rises in the distance.
The west facing orientation of this home provides all day sun on your totally private pool and sundeck. The sunsets are usually spectacular and the distant lights of St. Thomas at night seem a world removed.
The north shore drive to your villa weaves past some of the worlds most beautiful beaches. Depending on how often you slow down to enjoy this splendid scenery, it’s usually a 15 – 20 minute drive into/from Cruz Bay and even closer to Coral Bay.

Design. Francis Bay Estates consists of three handsome stone buildings, each with two levels. The buildings are connected by covered walkways and brick decks and each building overlooks the pool and the spacious sundeck. You park above the buildings, walk through a stone gateway with copper doors and then descend brick stairs to the upper level. On your left screened mahogany doors open to the spacious great room (1000 sq/ft), in the main house which contains the living, dining and kitchen and pantry areas. Off the great room is a 500 sq/ft covered deck that overlooks the pool and the unspoiled views. The buildings opposite the main house contains four nearly equal 325 sq/ft bedrooms and baths, all with king beds, with two on the upper level and two on the lower level. The fifth bedroom, also 325 sq/ft and with twin beds, is under the great room and opens to the pool deck. Exterior brick stairs lead from the upper level to the bedrooms and pool on the lower level. The 35 foot pool is bounded on 3 sides by a spacious (3500 sq/ft) antique brick sun deck, complete with BBQ grill and a dining table. Colorful landscaping surrounds the pool, sun deck and the entire villa, and the most spectacular landscaping (the National Park) extends for miles around you.

The Great Room is a beautiful example of a classic plantation style great room, with mahogany floors, windows and antiques, and a vaulted ceiling with valence lighting. Six sets of 8 foot tall, fully screened mahogany doors open to the wrap around covered deck and the views. Close the doors to the armoire and your living room looks like you’ve returned to a beautiful 19 century plantation house. Open the armoire doors and turn on the satellite TV/DVD, or the AM/FM/CD or plug in your I Pod and enjoy the surround sound system (10 Bose speakers), and you’ll quickly return to the 21st century.

Caribbean Villas' View. From a distance, this very handsome stone and antique brick plantation style home looks like it might have been built in the 19th century, when this land was used to grow the sugar cane that became the rum that (along with a few pirates) made these islands infamous. However, this classic estate home was completed in 2005 and underneath its stone exterior is a thoroughly modern, elegant and very tasteful interior.
This is undeniably a spacious, luxurious and beautifully furnished home, but the feature that really sets this house apart is its location. Unlike other luxury villas, the Francis Bay Estate house does not have villas on adjacent lots or anywhere in your view, with the exception of one house on St. John and 15 miles away on St. Thomas. At night, and even at times during the day, you might get the feeling that you’re alone on an island in 1950, or even 1850. This is privacy in one of its purest forms on St. John, for the National Park landscape that surrounds you remains pristine and undisturbed.
It looks and feels like you’re in the middle of nowhere, but this (sort of) beach house is an easy walk to Francis Bay beach, and also close to the beach at Maho Bay. For families with beach loving kids, couples or wedding parties, this is a unique choice in island homes.
A bold, beautiful and thoroughly elegant home, and one of the most private, naturalist settings in the Virgin Islands qualifies the Francis Bay Estate house as one of St John’s Ultra Luxury Villas.*
If you desire a more modest home at a more modest price, one of Francis Bay’s unseen neighbors is the 4-bedroom Villa Serenity.
* Ultra Luxury Villas of St. John refers to rental homes that rent for $13,000 or more per week. The market value of these homes varies in price from $5,000,000 to $14,000,000.
Повече инфо: http://www.caribbeanvilla.com/
Лукс имоти. Имот Kismet на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

LOCATION. Kismet is located on Maria Bluff, which is the south-facing peninsula between Great Cruz Bay and Chocolate Hole Harbor (see Map). Maria Bluff has always been a desirable neighborhood of distinctive villas like Las Brisas Caribe, and now Kismet brings a new elegance and refinement to this upscale neighborhood. Kismet sits on the highest and most private point of land on Maria Bluff. This location provides fabulous 360 degree sunrise/sunset views, plus vistas that include Rams Head to the east, St Croix to the south, St Thomas, Hans Lollick and Lovango to the west, and the hills of St. John to the north. Kismet enjoys excellent peacefulness and tranquility because it occupies an unusually large lot. The land is actually large enough to have private walking paths that wind through beautiful tropical gardens.

The restaurants, tennis courts and fitness room and spa at the Westin Resort are a 3 minute drive, and the charming boutiques, restaurants and nightlife of Cruz Bay are less than a 10 minute drive.
Bedrooms/Baths 5+ Bedrooms, 6.5 Baths
Beds 4 kings, 2 twins, 2 singles
Pool Yes - 17 ft x 37 ft x 3 - 8 ft
Hot Tub Yes - 4-6 person
A/C Yes - central, all rooms
Home Theater Yes, with a 50 inch TV/DVD
Satellite TV Yes, 9 TVs + 9 DVDs
High Speed Internet Yes, DSL most rooms + Wifi
Intercom Room to room to concierge
Beach 3 min to Westin Resort beach
Villa Size 11,500 sq ft (int & ext)
Maid Service Every day
Concierge Services On site concierge
Damage Dep $1,500
Transfers to St. John Provided
No Smoking Outside only please

DESIGN. The gated entrance to Kismet leads to the caretaker's house where you park and then ascend stairs to the great house. Kismet consists of three centrally air conditioned buildings (pavilions) that are connected by covered walkways. The east pavilion (the great house) contains the living room, dining room, kitchen and theater, all at ground level. The master bedroom, bath and sitting room are in the south pavilion, also at ground level, and the four guest bedrooms plus the pool room are in the 2-story west pavilion. Located beside the master bedroom is a flight of stairs that leads up to the sunrise/sunset gazebo with its spectacular 360 degree views. All three pavilions face into a spacious tiled courtyard with a 37 foot pool, hot tub, outdoor dining and barbeque area and lovely views. Kismet is surrounded by expansive and beautiful lawns and gardens and a walking path with romantic seating areas weaves through this garden paradise.
textStr.DIV: LIVING ROOM. Like the living/dining areas of Delfina, Kismet's centrally air-conditioned rooms are the very definition of elegance and loveliness. The 460 sq/ft living room has wonderful views to the south and west, a dry bar, satellite TV/DVD, Sirius satellite radio, plus a 5-disc CD with a good music collection. The sound system plays through speakers in the living room, dining room and at the pool and the pool patio. A desk in the living room has a fax and a PC, and a DSL line, or bring your laptop and get online almost anywhere with Kismet's Wifi.
textStr.P: The gourmet kitchen has custom mahogany cabinets, granite countertops, top of the line appliances and a pantry. It also includes:

UL.LI:
a chefs 6-burner gas stove with full hood and a s/s double oven,
oversized refrigerator and icemaker, dishwasher, and microwave,
a warming drawer, soft ice cream machine, coffeemaker, double toaster, blender, etc.
a CD/AM/FM player and 13 inch satellite TV to keep the chef(s) entertained,
Two laundries are off the kitchen

textStr.DIV: All the bedrooms include wonderful views, a/c, satellite TV, a telephone and room to room intercom, a safe, Wifi access plus plug in DSL, two Kismet bathrobes and two pair of Kismet slippers and a hair dryer. The daily maid service includes making beds, washing towels and cleaning the bathrooms and kitchen. Sheets are changed once at midweek.
textStr.P: The four guest bedrooms and baths are located in a 2-story building on the south side of the pool patio. The upper level bedrooms, both with king beds open onto the spacious pool deck. Exterior stairs lead down to the two lower bedrooms (one king bed, the other with 2 twins which, open onto a large tiled patio with a water fountain.
textStr.DIV: The pool room is on the lower bedroom level and also opens onto the water fountain patio. This a/c room contains a regulation pool table, wet bar, dart board, two single beds, a full bath and a safe for valuables. This is the only room in Kismet where smoking is allowed.

THEATER. This is one of St John's best theaters (Sea Cove also has a superb theater). The theater is off the living room and includes custom mahogany ceiling and wall panels, separate a/c, six electric reclining 1st class seats, a 50 inch satellite Pioneer Elite flat screen TV, six surround sound speakers by Klipsch, a laser disc player, plus DVD and VHS, plus an excellent selection of laser discs, DVDs and tapes.

The sunset gazebo above the master bedroom is accessed by exterior stairs and offers stunning 360 degree views of St. John and the islands that surround it. The overstuffed cushions provide very comfortable seating and the open design insures Caribbean breezes. Like the cozy seating along the walking paths in Kismet's gardens, this is also a lovely retreat.

DIV.P:
CARIBBEAN VILLAS' VIEW. After many years of construction, Kismet was completed in 2006. There is no question that by any standards this is a villa of exceptional beauty, comfort, craftsmanship and dЁ¦cor. Kismet is so exceptional that it raises the question - is this now St. John's finest rental villa? Could be, we'll let you decide.
Some of the features that give Kismet St. John's highest 5-star rating include:

UL.LI:
The location. This multi acre lot provides unusual privacy, peacefulness, and serenity, yet you're less than 10 minutes from Cruz Bay. The sunrise, sunset, day and evening views are lovely and the private paths that weave through the expansive estate gardens are a unique and delightful feature.
Concierge personnel. Kismet and the Peter Bay Beach House are the only villas that we offer that include full time manager/concierge personnel (see notes below).
The theater is a marvelous media room that combines comfort (power reclining seats), great audio visual effects (50 inch screen plus surround sound) and outstanding craftsmanship and attention to detail.
The ceilings and floors of Kismet are in keeping with the entire estate, absolutely stunning and unique. As you walk from room to room you'll notice that the ceilings are of different designs, but all built with great care and superb craftsmanship. (For example, look at the ceiling in the theater). The same is true of the gorgeous floors where the tile and the floor patterns are all Moroccan. It took three years to tile Kismet and the result is beautiful artwork, almost too lovely to walk on. (For example, look at the floor in the gazebo.)

P.BR: In sum, Kismet shows such impeccable attention to detail and quality that the entire villa could be considered a work of art. For our clients who demand the very best in elegance, comfort and luxury in a Caribbean villa, we recommend Kismet. If Kismet is unavailable for the dates you desire, consider Delfina or one of our other Ultra Luxury Villas.

Concierge. At Kismet the managers reside in their own building on the estate and carefully respect your desire for privacy. Their primary function is to insure that Kismet is consistently maintained in 5 star fashion but they also will make dinner recommendations and reservations, daily trips into Cruz Bay, babysitting services, travel arrangements and other concierge services

TD.P: Complimentary Transfers. Transfers for Kismet guests from the St. Thomas airport to the National Park Dock in Cruz Bay, St. John are included. A private taxi will meet you at the St. Thomas airport and take you to the ferry dock at Red Hook. A private water taxi will then take you to St. John where you will be met by Kismet's concierge. The transfer services require 4 weeks notice prior to arrival.
For Babies and Toddlers, Kismet comes equipped with an LA Baby crib, highchair, Fisher-Price Intellitainer, stroller, car seat and a playpen.

textStr.P: Лукс имоти. Имот Long View на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

LOCATION. Long View is located on the south side of the hill that separates Hart Bay from Chocolate Hole, in the same general area where LeLapin and Rara Avis are located. This is a private and quiet location on a dead end road where the only sounds you usually hear are the waves breaking on the beach at Hart Bay. The delightful views sweep 200 degrees from the east to the northwest, and include sunrises and sunsets. To the east you overlook Hart Bay in the foreground and St. Croix in the distance, to the south you view Dog Island, the St. James Islands and the southern reaches of St. Thomas, while to the west lie the Hans Lollick Islands, Thatch Island and the north end of St. Thomas. It's an easy 10-minute drive into Cruz Bay on paved roads, and an even easier 5-minute drive to the restaurants, beach, spa and tennis courts at the Westin.

DESIGN. Long View is a spacious and very appealing 2 bedroom villa. You park in the 3 car parking area below the house and ascend stairs to the lower level where you find the pool and sundeck, the lower bedroom/bath, the laundry room and a wrap around covered deck. Exterior stairs from the pool deck lead up to the second level with the living/dining/kitchen areas, a half bath, the master bedroom/bath and the screened in porch. Another covered deck wraps around the east and south sides of the upper level. The entire house and its lovely sundeck and pool are surrounded by beautiful, abundant and especially well maintained tropical landscaping

LIVING/DINING/PORCH. The living room has vaulted ceilings, tiled floors and views to the east, south and west. There is wireless internet (DSL) that works well at the pool or on the decks or porch. The Bose Wave Stereo/CD has an i Pod connection and can be played in the living room or at the pool. A half bath is located off the great room.
There is a dining table for four in the great room, a table for six on the pool deck and bar chairs at the kitchen bar/counter.
The screened in porch is furnished with a futon sofa bed and has scenic views of Chocolate Hole in the foreground and St. Thomas in the distance.
textStr.DIV: KITCHEN. The tiled kitchen is both attractive and well-equipped and includes a four-burner gas stove and oven, refrigerator/freezer, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, toaster oven and blender. There is plenty of cookware and dinnerware, and a telephone. A washer/dryer and a gas barbeque grill are located on the lower level.

BEDROOMS. The master bedroom (king bed) is on the upper level and has a cathedral ceiling and a private balcony that overlooks Hart Bay. The lower level bedroom opens to the pool deck and has 2 twin trundle beds which can be converted to a king and also provides extra beds for children. Both bedrooms have air conditioning and tiled baths.
CARIBBEAN VILLAS' VIEW. We were thrilled to add this excellent 2-bedroom villa to our portfolio in the spring of 2008. These owners spend a lot of time on St. John - mostly maintaining and improving their home - and even though Long View was built in 2004, the owner’s TLC gives it the look and feel of a new villa. Along with its desirable location and amenities, the extra care that Long View receives makes it a very appealing villa. Its best features include;
Wireless DSL that provides coverage at the pool, or on porch and covered decks, plus a Bose stereo/CD + i Pod dock that can be played in the great room or at the pool,
Like Anole, this is one of only a few villas with a screened in porch. The porch faces west and is great for sunsets and evening relaxation.
For those who love to lie in the sun, the large (and private) sundeck gets sun from early morning to sunset. It’s surrounded by gorgeous tropical landscaping and is centered on an 18 foot pool.
For those who like to be outside but not in the sun, you’ve got wrap around covered decks with deck furniture on both levels.
Pick your view – east, south or west – sunrise or sunset, they’re all quite scenic and enjoyable.
The great room has opening windows on all four sides, which provides lots of light and cooling breezes, while both bedrooms are cooled by powerful a/c units,
This is a convenient and easy to get to location, but it’s also private, quiet and restful, with background music provided by the surf breaking on Hart Bay.
textStr.P: Повече инфо: http://www.caribbeanvilla.com/
Лукс имоти. Имот Peace and Plenty на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

Location. Peace and Plenty is the most recently built (2006) of the four villas that we offer that overlook the turquoise waters and white sands of beautiful Cinnamon Bay, along St. John’s fabled north shore. Cinnamon Bay is totally surrounded by St. John’s stunning National Park, and as with the luxury homes we offer at Peter Bay, the villas in this exclusive neighborhood are first rate. Although Peace and Plenty does have a neighbor on its west side (Anole), you cannot see Anole and remain unaware of its presence. The name Peace and Plenty is an accurate description of the setting - plenty of peacefulness and tranquility and plenty of (clothing optional) privacy. You’re located 480 feet above Cinnamon Bay and the views of Jost Van Dyke in the distance and Whistling Cay, Mary Point and the National Park in the foreground are absolutely gorgeous. Cinnamon Bay and Trunk Bay lie below you and offer excellent swimming, snorkeling, kayaking, wind surfing, sunning and stress free relaxation. It's a 10-15 minute drive from Cruz Bay and the last 1/2 mile is a bumpy dirt road intended to discourage tourists from exploring this quiet neighborhood
textStr.DIV: Design. Peace and Plenty is a spacious 3-level villa with most of the livings areas on the main level. The villa consists of 3 buildings that stretch more than 130 feet and are tied together with decks and covered walkways and a gazebo. You park just outside the door and enter onto the pool deck. The great room and two bedrooms are on the left of the pool and the outdoor living area and two more bedrooms are on the right of the pool. A hallway off the great room leads to the lower left bedroom, while the upper left bedroom is accessed by exterior stairs. The right pair of bedrooms is beyond the outdoor living area (lanai) with each of the two bedrooms being a half level below or above the pool deck level. A game room with a ping pong table is on the lower level.

Interior Living Room. You enter the 600 sq/ft great room through screened sliding pocket doors. The great room has a handsome, classic Caribbean look with tiled floors, beamed cathedral ceilings with track lighting, and custom built mahogany furniture and cabinets. A 42” cable HD plasma TV/DVD and stereo/CD provide the electronic entertainment

DIV.DIV: Outdoor living area. One of the most popular design features in an island home is a lanai (outdoor living/dining area), such as that found in the very popular villa Rapture. Peace and Plenty takes great advantage of its lovely setting with its comfortable 500 sq/ft lanai. This is more than a deck with furniture; it’s an outdoor living area with comfortable furniture and a 10 person dining table that sit under a large gazebo that protects you from the sun and the occasion island shower. From the lanai you look through columned arches at the beautiful views of Jost Van Dyke and the unspoiled National Park. The half bath is just off the lanai, as is the gas grill.

Kitchen. The gorgeous kitchen is defined by granite, mahogany, and lovely views seen through arched windows that run the length of the kitchen. A granite and mahogany bar/counter that seats 4 separates the kitchen from the living room. Behind the bar is a gourmet kitchen with custom built mahogany cabinets, granite countertops, a 5-burner gas stove and oven, large refrigerator/freezer, dishwasher, icemaker, microwave, toaster, blender, coffee maker, and abundant cookware and dinnerware. A half moon bar with bar chairs is off the kitchen and opens to the pool deck through a window.

Bedrooms. The four air conditioned bedrooms are equal in size (about 225 sq/ft) and each includes a private balcony or deck and an elegant granite and mahogany tiled bath. All the bedrooms include custom built mahogany 4-poster king beds that look out at the romantic views

DIV.P:
Caribbean Villa's Comments. Completed in November of 2006, Peace and Plenty is the newest addition to the other superb homes (Anole, Cinnamon Bay Estate, and Cinnamon Ridge) that we offer that overlook Cinnamon Bay on the exclusive North Shore of St. John. This neighborhood, much like Peter Bay, is one of St. John’s most beautiful and desirable neighborhoods. In this unspoiled setting in the midst of the National Park you’re surrounded by a naturalist’s world of sea, sky and pristine park lands. If you value tranquility, natural beauty and the feeling of being alone, this is heaven on an island.
Peace and Plenty is the 4th from the last villa on a dead end road (Anole, Cinnamon Bay Estate, and Cinnamon Ridge are the villas beyond you), so there is very little traffic and your superb privacy (clothing optional) is assured. (Curious tourists rarely, if ever, wander down Wattapalma Road.) Although it’s only a 2-minute walk to Anole, the dense tropical forest around you insures that you can neither see, nor be seen by, another villa.
As for the villa itself, the photos leave no doubt that Peace and Plenty is a spacious, beautiful, and very comfortable luxury villa. Everything about this villa is appealing; from the bedrooms to the great room to the outdoor living area, this is a very tasteful home with a distinct sense of island elegance. Peace and Plenty is an excellent vacation home for families or for 1-4 couples, and this romantic and beautiful setting is also well suited for honeymooners and lovers. If your travel plans include more than 8 people, Peace and Plenty’s neighbors, (Anole, Cinnamon Bay Estates, and Cinnamon Ridge) are all popular vacation homes that are within walking distance.

textStr.P: Повече инфо: http://www.caribbeanvilla.com/peaceplenty/index.html
Лукс имоти. Имот Rapture на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

Location. Rapture sits in an excellent location along the uppermost property line of the exclusive Virgin Grand Estates. This is a private and quiet gated neighborhood of recently built and very tasteful multi million dollar vacation homes. Rapture sits at an elevation of more than 600 feet and the higher you go, the better the view gets, and this expansive view is outstanding. It stretches more than 180 degrees to the south and west and includes the islands of St. James, St. Thomas, Hans Lollick, Lovango and many more. The sunset views are dazzling, and the twinkling lights of St. Thomas provide beautiful evening views that make nights on the deck a memorable experience.
Rapture is located on a dead end road within the Virgin Grand Estates. With only 4 villas (as of June 07) on this road, there is very little road noise in this peaceful setting. From your deck, the sun arcs across the Caribbean Sea and provides you with an ever-changing, all day panorama of color. This is also a sun lover's villa, with sun on the pool deck from 9am to sunset, although the pool, the gazebo and the trade winds and a/c in every room will keep you comfortably cool. About a quarter-mile walk below you are the restaurants, beach and fitness room of the Westin Resort, while the renowned restaurants and shops of Cruz Bay are a 10-15 minute drive, entirely on paved roads.

Design. Rapture is a well appointed and spacious (5000 sq ft) villa that was completed in July of 2005. It was designed to be a blend of classic Caribbean elegance with modern comforts and entertainment systems, and it excels in each capacity. Some of the classic design features include; beamed cathedral ceilings, tiled roofs, white interior tiled floors and nonskid exterior tiled decks, 12 foot Doric columns, a large gazebo and outdoor gallery (living area), exquisite custom crafted mahogany cabinets, furniture and vanities, and 8 foot mahogany doors.
View Floorplans

This is a 2 level home with most of the living areas on the upper level. You park on the upper level and enter Rapture through a set of mahogany doors that open to the spacious air conditioned great room. The kitchen and the interior dining area adjoin the great room and all look out at the gorgeous views. The pool, hot tub and sundeck are on the left (east) side of the great room, while the 450 square foot gallery is under the gazebo on the south side of the house. A hallway on the right side of the great room leads to the two upper level bedrooms and baths plus a half bath, while interior and exterior stairs lead to the two lower level bedrooms/baths, the family room and a laundry room..

The air conditioned kitchen at Rapture is gorgeous. The custom built solid mahogany cabinets are exceptional in quality and appearance, and they beautifully compliment the polished granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, tiled floor and the beamed cathedral ceiling. It's also well equipped, with a 5-burner gas stove and oven with ventilator hood, a s/s microwave oven, a s/s refrigerator/freezer, s/s microwave, s/s dishwasher, a refrigerated wine rack, a granite kitchen island with 4 Bauer tropical chairs, and much more. A pantry and a small workstation with a desk separate the kitchen from the entryway. A mahogany and granite half bath is off the kitchen, while a large laundry room with twin washer and dryers is on the lower level. A Webber barbeque grill is on the pool deck. Overall, this kitchen is exceptionally elegant and functional, and chefs will love working in this space.

The fully air conditioned 1000 sq. ft. interior living area (the great room) is defined by a towering 25' cathedral ceiling and 8' arched doors and windows that frame the wonderful views. It is furnished in a very comfortable tropical fashion with Neiman Marcus, Bauer and custom mahogany furniture. The centerpiece of the great room is a custom built mahogany entertainment center with a 51 inch Toshiba wide screen satellite TV with DVD/VCR plus a stereo/CD player.

The formal, interior dining room is on the pool side of the great room and is also air conditioned and seats 10. For dining outside, a teak table under the gazebo also seats 8 and there is a breakfast/lunch table on the pool deck that seats 4 on swiveled high backed bar stools.
The exterior living room (the gallery) sits under an 18 foot tall gazebo and has superb views. This is a wonderfully relaxing spot for a good book, drink or conversation. The gazebo seats nine on cushioned outdoor furniture, including a glider loveseat and glider chairs.

Bedrooms. The 2 upper level bedrooms (king beds) open to small balconies, while the 2 lower bedrooms (1 king and 2 Tommy Bahama twins) open to small patios. There is also a king sized daybed in the family room. All bedrooms and the family room have romantic water views, satellite TV and lots of closet space. The 2 upper bedrooms plus the family room also have a DVD and VCR. All 4 bedrooms also have tiled baths with strikingly beautiful custom built mahogany and granite vanities.

Caribbean Villa's View. For the past 30 years the owners/designers of Rapture were in the business of building luxury homes in the US.
For 10 years the owners rented from us and often dreamed about building their own island home, and in 2005 their dream became a reality. Rapture now stands as proof that in building a St. John luxury home, there's no substitute for extensive building knowledge and experience, combined with a big budget.
Rapture comes real close to being the house that has it all; its location, ambiance, d?¦cor, amenities, and comfort level are really first class.
This is another one of those villas that offers so much that you may spend most of your vacation in your villa, although you really should explore St. John's world class beaches and National Park. Some of the "I've died and gone to heaven" features that distinguish Rapture include;

UL.LI:
a 450 square foot outdoor living and dining area (the gallery) with spectacular views and comfortable cushioned furniture for nine. Monte Bay also has a gallery, and many past guests of Monte have told us that they absolutely love this design feature. The gazebo keeps the gallery shaded and cool, and for people who love to be outside but not in the sun, this gallery is a blessing.
a 26' x 14' pool and a 4-person hot tub that is built into a corner of the pool, so you can easily flop from the hot tub into the pool
(a very refreshing move) and back.
a 51 inch Toshiba wide screen satellite TV surrounded by sink-into-it furniture in the a/c great room, a 31 inch TV in the family room and 27 inch TVs in each bedroom, all hooked up to a satellite dish, plus four DVDs and VCRs.
a stereo/CD system that plays through 6 sets of speakers, with 2 speakers in the great room, 2 on the pool deck and 2 in the gallery.
a family room with regulation Foos Ball, a Nintendo game cube and satellite TV/DVD/VCR (and a 5th pullout bed).

textStr.P:
Let's not forget the location. In addition to the spectacular views, dazzling sunsets and peace and quiet that Rapture offers, when you've got impressive neighbors like C'est Blue, Vista Caribe, and South Palm, you're in a very nice neighborhood. Despite a sense of being removed from the rest of the island, the many delights of Cruz Bay are only a 10-15 minute drive, all on paved roads.
Rapture was designed for families and the floor plan, family room and amenities make this a very inviting family vacation home. This is also a superb home for 2-4 couples, or honeymooners, or lovers looking for a luxury love nest.
Повече инфо: http://www.caribbeanvilla.com/
Лукс имоти. Имот Sea Cove на карибите. Вилата не се продава но можете да я вземете под наем.

LOCATION. Sea Cove is located in the middle of
Peter Bay, less than a 5-minute walk to the white sands and turquoise waters of Peter Bay Beach. Peter Bay is one of the few parcels of pristine north shore land that was not deeded over to the National Park by Lawrence Rockefeller in the 1950s, and today it remains tranquil, peaceful, private and exceptionally scenic, surrounded
as it is on all sides by National Park forests, waters and reefs.
The Peter Bay homes (as of 2003 there were about a dozen) all have deeded access to the beach at Peter Bay which is located between the National Park beaches at Trunk Bay and Cinnamon Bay and is very similar to these world class, exceptionally beautiful beaches. The fine white sand and usually calm turquoise waters of this beautiful beach provide excellent swimming and good snorkeling. On a perfect beach day in January the National park beaches will host hundreds of people, but it’s rare to see even a handful of people on Peter Bay (it’s privately owned).
The wonderful views from Sea Cove look north and east and include the lush mountains of the north shore of St. John, Cinnamon, Maho and Francis Bays, Whistling Cay, and Great Thatch and Tortola in the British Virgin Islands. It’s a 5-10 minute, incredibly picturesque drive to the three restaurants at the acclaimed Caneel Bay Resort, and another 5-10 minute drive to the captivating restaurants, shops and groceries in the fun loving, delightful town of Cruz Bay.

DESIGN. This majestic home consists of a large 2-level great house with three bedrooms and a 2-level guesthouse with two more bedrooms, which is sited across the circular entry courtyard. The upper level of the great house contains the kitchen, living and dining rooms, an office, a master bedroom, and a spacious deck that runs the entire length of the house. Interior stairs lead to the lower level with 2 bedrooms, a second living room / media room and a large pool and coral stone pool deck. Overall, this is a strikingly attractive and spacious design that incorporates coral stone floors and decks, arched entryways flanked by coral pillars, arched handcrafted cedar doors, handsome stone walls, tiled roofs and rich and unusual furnishings and accessories. The design, furnishings and accessories leave no doubt that this is one of St John’s finest luxury villas.
textStr.DIV: LIVING/DINING/KITCHEN. Sea Cove has three different living areas, four if you include the theater. The upper living room adjoins the dining room and kitchen and has vaulted ceilings, coral floors, and very comfortable custom furniture. Seven sets of arched French doors lead from the living room to the coral stone upper deck. There’s no TV or DVD here, this room is for reading or for listening to the outstanding sound quality coming from the Bryson top of the line stereo/CD/VCR system. For movies or sports, head down to the lower living area which also has plush furniture, a wet bar and frig and a 60 inch Sony projection TV. In 2003, an adjoining garage on the upper level was totally remodeled into a lovely state of the art library/home theater with a Sony 60 inch plasma TV/DVD, giving guests a total of 3 living/entertainment rooms.

The kitchen is very well equipped with first class equipment and appliances, including; 2 refrigerator/freezers, twin ovens, a 5-burner gas stove, microwave, icemaker, bread maker, grill machine, steamer, blender, Caphalon cookware and complete dinnerware. The interior dining table is off the kitchen but there are dining tables on both decks. A cozy garden dining nook with a stainless steel barbeque and a table for 6 is just outside the kitchen.

This Home Theater is in the running (along with the theater at Kismet) for best home theater and audio room on St. John. This 400 sq/ft room seats 8 and has custom built bamboo floors and handcrafted burled maple cabinets and walls. It’s quite a beautiful room, but when you turn on the sound system - it becomes magnificent. The two Rotel RB 1080 amplifiers plus a Rotel stereo amplifier and a Panamax Regenerator amplifier push fantastic sound out to $10,000 worth of custom built surround sound speakers. For the non technophile, this is near perfect sound reproduction that will blow your socks off. (It also has iPod connectivity.) For entertainment, the theater has a 50” flat screen TV and DVD plus a wine refrigerator and sink.

BEDROOMS. All bedrooms have A/C and all (except the lower guest house bedroom) have sliding screened glass doors that open to views, decks or balconies. The master bedroom (king) is on the upper level of the great house and features a large his and her bathroom and dressing room. Two more bedrooms (king and queen) are in the lower level of the great house on either side of the living area. The bedrooms in the guesthouse have queen beds and the lower bedroom is a suite with a small kitchen and sleep sofa. All bedrooms have a satellite TV/VCR and a tiled bath and shower.
textStr.P:
CARIBBEAN VILLAS' VIEWS. Peter Bay has now become the home of St. John’s most impressive collection of grand and luxurious villas. The homes at Peter Bay, and especially Sea Cove and its neighbors Peter Bay Beach House, Coco De Mer, Cinnamon Breeze, Delfina, Amorosa and Mermaid Falls have actually redefined the concept of a luxury rental villa on St John. Even allowing for the fact that Peter Bay is now synonymous with luxury homes, Sea Cove still stands out as a superb, 5 star vacation villa. The exclusive and beautiful Peter Bay location, and the overall commitment to a grand design and excellent theater, living areas, sound systems and pool, makes Sea Cove an exceptional rental villa that definitely deserves to be labeled as one of St. John’s “Ultra Luxury Villas”.
Sea Cove’s emphasis on natural light and bright, cheerful colors distinguishes it from many tropical homes. There is an absence of dark tropical woodwork and tile, instead the accent is on off white or bright interior colors that frame the vivid blues and greens outside your windows. This gives Sea Cove a warm, friendly and inviting atmosphere; this is a happy house that you will greatly enjoy spending time in.
The well maintained, flourishing landscaping gives Sea Cove complete visual privacy from the neighboring villa above you, and the lovely view of Peter Bay and beyond shows only a few roof lines. When you are in Sea Cove there is a wonderful feeling of privacy, serenity and seclusion, yet you are a short drive from the delightful restaurants, shopping and nightlife of Cruz Bay.
For music lovers, movie fans and TV viewers, this home has the finest collection of high-end visual and audio components on St. John. Acoustic engineers were flown in from the USA to design the Bryston audio system and the clarity and accuracy of sound reproduction is outstanding. The 60-inch plasma TV in the home theater and the 60-inch projection TV in the lower level living area, plus the Sony TVs in every bedroom, are all on a mega channel satellite network. The top of the line stereo and visual equipment, plus the satellite network, plus a movie and music collection, all combine to provide the island’s best home for listening and viewing entertainment.
Still, the best entertainment is the island that surrounds you. Walk to great swimming and snorkeling at the beach below you, or drive less than 5 minutes to world famous beaches at Trunk or Cinnamon Bays, or drive 5 minutes to Caneel Bay Resort. This is the type of villa that gives you little reason to leave the house, but St. John, with it’s national park hiking trails, protected reefs and beaches and delightful shops and restaurants, gives you plenty of reasons to leave your villa.
The floor plan and design make this a very versatile home for families, business meetings, or groups of friends or couples. If you lock off the guesthouse, the great house makes a magnificent, luxurious and ever so romantic villa for a deluxe honeymoon, anniversary or special occasion.

UL.LI:
A cascading waterfall that sounds like a Montana babbling brook when it comes on at 7:30 each morning
Three separate living areas, a state of the art stereo system, and two big screen TVs
Swimming at night, (or anytime) in the 40 ft heated pool
A home office with a 2-line telephone, fax, answering machine and PC with Internet access
A gorgeous home theater with a magnificent sound system

textStr.P: Имот в Италия - вила Парадисо:
Sunny villa with lake access. Located in the small village "Tronzano" - close to the Swiss border. The old village center - surrounded with isolated located holiday homes and villas -mai ...

Sunny villa with lake access.
Located in the small village "Tronzano" - close to the Swiss border.
The old village center - surrounded with isolated located holiday homes and villas -maintains the architectural mountain village style typical for the foothills of the Alps.
Not far away in the district Bassano you can view the church of Santa Maria Assunta with its Romanic bell tower.
For sports freaks there is a big variety of possibilities: hiking, golfing and - because of the ideal wind conditions - sailing and surfing.
You reach the estate via stone stairs to the entrance on the turned away side of the lake. On a living area of about 110 sqm the villa disposes of two levels that are independent and both are accessible from outside.
On the ground floor there is an ample living room with access to the balcony of about 26 sqm, a kitchen, a bathroom and two bedrooms from where you also have access to the balcony.
The basement is divided in two ample rooms and a second bathroom with shower.
Here you can see the cosy dining corner in the living room next to the stone fireplace and the exclusive leather couch furniture in front of the wall unit.
From both friendly equipped bedrooms you reach the roofed balcony where you can start your day with an extensive breakfast. In the evening with a glass of wine and view to the lake and breathtaking sunsets you can leave behind everyday hassle.
The new kitchen with ceramic cooker top, oven, stainless steel sink and dishwasher is divided optical from the living room though a bar. The bathroom is completely tiled and disposes of a bathtub.
The villa was partly renovated, e.g. new double glazed windows and a new entrance door were installed.
From the estate of about 85 sqm there is a small ladder that leads directly to the Lago Maggiore. So you always have the possibility to refresh yourself in the lake and back in the villa you can enjoy the fantastic view to the lake and the western side of the foothills of the Alps.

Close to Rome - huge villa with apartments for sale !
The villa offers approximately 310 sqm living area and 40 sqm balcony and terrace.
The layout:
Ground Floor: 2 entrances, a service entrance and a main entrance. From the service entrance you can reach a guests toilet, a service bedroom of around 10sqm with own bathroom with toilet and shower, 40sqm kitchen with storing room. From the main entrance you enter a big area from which you can reach: 100sqm living room, a library/studio of around 22sqm and a staircase going up to the first floor and down to the cellar.
First Floor of around 100sqm: 3 bedrooms + 3 bathrooms (one with shower only, the other 2 with baths), 2 storage areas, one connecting 2 bedrooms and 1 for the 3rd bedroom. Every bedroom and every bathroom have a balcony.
There is around 2,000sqm of park/garden disposed over 2 levels. There is a swimming pool of around 60sqm (currently under reparation and maintenance) a big wood oven and BBQ area, 500m of access road (youЃLll get a usage permission) to the mainstreet and car parking places (not covered).
nr1 NB = on the lower (garden) level, where the swimming pool and BBQ area are, there were 2 covered boxes for the car. These two have been reorganized into two mini apartments or Ѓgmini loftsЃh (monolocali) with own bathroom (toilet + shower) and kitchen corner of around 35sqm one and 45sqm the other one.
Currently, the average monthly income of the 2 mini apartments is around 1,300eur (900eur of rent and the rest for light, water, gas and maintenance).
nr2 NB = there is a hypothec/mortgage on the ground floor apartment only for remaining Euro 95,000 with the UNICREDIT Bank, currently the monthly payment is around Euro 900 with variable rate but this can be changed every 2 years.
